alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Lonoke; Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:52PM CDT until March 31 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Lonoke County in central Arkansas... South central Faulkner County in central Arkansas... North central Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 251 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chenal Valley, or near West Little Rock, moving northeast at 60 mph. * This will produce a significant hazard to those currently engaged in search and rescue operations. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... North Little Rock... Benton... Sherwood... Jacksonville... West Little Rock... Maumelle... Bryant... Downtown Little Rock... North Little Rock Airport... Little Rock AFB... Southwest Little Rock... Argenta... Otter Creek... Gravel Ridge... Olmstead... Protho Junction... Lakewood... Camp Robinson... Geyer Springs... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Arkansas.
